column5: So anyway quite a while back I responded to one of the seemingly endless hockey threads.  I felt the need to stick up for my team (the Leafs) after some particularly nasty, rub salt in your wounds comments by a couple of Hab's fans.  The very next day low and behold my inbox is full of Montreal Canadien fan info. Newsletters, team info, etc.  I've been unable to rid myself of this.  And I'm get this crap sent to me on a daily basis.  I believe someone on the board signed me up for this abuse, it's waaay too much of a coincidence.  Don't get me wrong, I'm not full of anger here. In fact I kind of admire the ingenuity.  One day you'll get yours.
Sounds like a Drifter Dave stunt to me.
If you ever find out who is responsible, let me know. I'd hate to think that this has been the root of your recent computer issues.
Both of those guys are suspects.
Are you getting any porn too?
Actually got that fixed finally. (when I tell you what the problem really was you'll laugh. I'm such a tard.  )
No.  That would be better than what I am getting by a long shot.
I'm always ready for a good laugh....LOL You know the number.
I'd still rather blame Habs fans.
oh come on lets hear it! Go leafs go!!!
Ah too bad, I was going to get you to forward it to me if it was any good...
